verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice, ye children of the Lord
Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice, rejoice
Rejoice ye children of the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise His Name, Praise His Name, Praise His Name Ye children of the Lord
Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice, rejoice,
Praise His Name ye children of the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Clap your hands, clap your hands, clap your hands
Ye children of the Lord.
Rejoice, rejoice, rejoice, rejoice
Rejoice ye children of the Lord.
